metadata.title: CVE-2016-4414 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The onReadyRead function in core/coreauthhandler.cpp in Quassel before 0.12.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and crash) via invalid handshake data.

criterions.comment: quassel package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.12.4-2ubuntu2').
